name: Commonwealth ex rel. Cimino, Appellant, v. Lucarelli
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Cimino v. Lucarelli

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Cimino, Appellant, v. Lucarelli.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Since the date of oral argument the issues involved in this litigation have become moot. Accordingly, the appeal is dismissed.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Ralph P. Carey, with him Carey and Mamoni, for appellant.
Carl Carey, with him Joseph J. Cimino, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Cimino, Appellant, v. Lucarelli.
Argued June 5, 1963.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
January 7, 1964:
Ralph P. Carey, with him Carey and Mamoni, for appellant.
Carl Carey, with him Joseph J. Cimino, District Attorney, for appellee.
